content: The armor can also be upgraded, with Silk once you reach Chen Loong and open the Zodiac Realm in The New West in Chapter 3.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Serpentscale_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Serpentscale Set'.
The content is as follows:
The armor can also be upgraded, with Silk once you reach Chen Loong and open the Zodiac Realm in The New West in Chapter 3.
